title: Upgrade to Windows 11 Pro and learn its tools with $260 off this bundle
content:
Macworld

If you’re a working professional, you’re probably using Windows, so upgrading your OS is a smart move. This bundle of Windows 11 Pro and the Essential Windows Pro 11 Course gives you everything you need to get more out of your laptop, at a special price through the end of January 21st.

Windows 11 Pro gives you all the useful aspects of Windows 11 combined with key professional features such as BitLocker encryption and virtual desktop tools that let you log into your machine from anywhere in the world. Meanwhile, the Essential Windows 11 Course walks you through the new aspects of this operating system upgrade, developed by the StreamSkill team as a training you can take at your own pace. 

Put Windows 11 Pro on your computer and get trained on using it with this Microsoft Windows 11 Pro + The Essential Windows 11 Pro Course bundle, for $39.97, $260 off the $298 MSRP, now through the end of January 21st.

 

Microsoft Windows 11 Pro + The Essential Windows 11 Pro Course – $39.97

See Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
